description:
os: fix NetBSD build

os.fileStat.Sys is no longer exported.

messages.text:
On 2012/02/25 17:07:47, bsiegert wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Thanks for this and the other one. However, I already have these in my tree, and after talking to Russ, we decided to wait until after Go1 is released to submit patches for NetBSD support.

LGTM
this is fine to fix now.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9d337b04e5cb ***

os: fix NetBSD build

os.fileStat.Sys is no longer exported.

R=golang-dev, m4dh4tt3r, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5696074

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

On Sat, Feb 25, 2012 at 22:54,  <m4dh4tt3r@gmail.com> wrote:
> Thanks for this and the other one. However, I already have these in my
> tree, and after talking to Russ, we decided to wait until after Go1 is
> released to submit patches for NetBSD support.

Like I said to ality for Plan 9, if you have trivial little things
like this that
just keep NetBSD from falling further behind, I am happy to apply them.
I want to put off making NetBSD better until after Go 1, but I don't want
to make it worse in the process.

Russ

subject: code review 5696074: os: fix NetBSD build
